title.rendered: Sample program to setup webhook and receive data over POST method and Send to Airtable

content.rendered:
This Sample program given here is created for one of my requirement and may it could help someone who is seeking for a sample program to setup webhook and receive data over POST method and process it and send it to Airtable to create a record there in the already existing table.

Before you proceed

  1. Make sure you update the Destination Airtable URL in the code
  2. Make sure you replace the dummy API key given in the program with your authentic API key
  3. This is created for my requirement,  you can use it/modify it/tweak it at your own risk/interest.
  4. This code creates a temp reporting file name “toairtable.txt”. Remove or rename it as per your need


Thanks,

A K S A R A V

Write to us at aksarav@mwinventory.in

 Follow us on Facebook | Twitter

 To Join our Community in Whatsapp – Click here
